name: Project TiTan The Redacted files University Demo
name_original: Project TiTan The Redacted files University Demo
description:
This game is made to help hype up the eventual book im writing.

the game focuses on Special Detective agent Trevor Vanguard as he deals with a serial killer case.

set after the book im writing the game takes place several months after the events that have happened and life is normal at that current stage, the world is on a recovery plan set up by the conglormorate Ragnarok after the financial crash of 2073.

Trevor must find and either subdue the serial killer (or even killers) or kill them.

for this demo there's no actual "gameplay" and is just a glorified walking sim with resident evil style gameplay in the works.

I had made this during my final year of university and would love to hear/see what people think of my ability here, everything was made by me unless specified otherwise (except for LUT's and a single skybox).
